mutants.code:
def generate_pattern(K: int) -> list[str]:
    pattern = []
    b = 2
    for i in range(1, K + 1):
        b += 1
        a = b
        line = ''
        for j in range(1, K + 1):
            line += str(a)
            a += 1
        pattern.append(line)
    return pattern
